products.description:
Sansevieria, also called mother-in-law's tongue, is a plant native to Africa, used indoors and very decorative.

Its foliage is original and elegant and the plant is very resistant, particularly to heat.
products.astuce: Sansevieria being an arid zone plant, watering should be moderate in summer, and very spaced out in winter. Let the substrate dry completely between two waterings and systematically empty the excess water flowing into the saucer or planter.
